Soaps all show rich people being miserable being so rich. Soaps exist to condition the masses on how miserable they would be if they were rich and make them feel better about how happy they are in their current station in life. "Boy, those rich folks sure are miserable. I think I'm happier being poor!"

Yes, everbody has an opinion BlackDahlia, but what Sam has written is so much more important and wide ranging than what you have written. If you feel equipped to write something more enlightening about this topic yourself, nobody is preventing you, and we promise we will not comment on your posting or potentially mislead others from reading it. The five stars above however, awarded by readers, suggest that they find some value in Sam's thoughts on this topic. Let's see how many stars you get.
